name: B.E.S. Leader Nemesis
text: 2+ "B.E.S." monsters This card's ATK is equal to the number of Counters on your side on the field X 300,/n also this card cannot be destroyed by battle.  "B.E.F. Zelos" you control cannot be destroyed by card effects. If another B.E.S. monster(s) is Summoned: Place 3 Counters on that Summoned monster(s). Once per turn (Quick Effect): You can destroy 1  "B.E.S" monster from your Deck; destroy 1 monster on the field.
